nodes.text: Lansono was a planet represented in the Galactic Senate of the Galactic Republic by Candabrine Bu during the leadup to the Clone Wars. Senator Bu voiced his doubts over Supreme Chancellor Palpatine's leadership to HoloNet News reporters, following the attempted assassination of Senator Padmé Amidala.
In Candabrine Bu's entry in The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia, Lansono is misspelled "Lansano."
